title: Minecraft Pocket Edition v0.10.0
description:

Minecraft is a game about placing blocks and going on adventures.

Pocket Edition includes Survival and Creative modes, multiplayer over a local Wi-Fi network, infinite worlds, caves, new biomes, mobs, villages and lots more. Craft, create and explore anywhere in the world so long as you have hands spare and battery to burn. 

ThereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s never been a better time to enjoy Minecraft on the move.

0.10 - Prettier, faster, less buggier

WeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve improved the graphics, increased performance, and killed off heaps of bugs in one massive update. WeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve also stopped baby animals from sinking when they try to swim because thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s just mean. Update and have fun!

- Loads of bug fixes! 
- More watery-looking water

- More fences! More fence gates! Everyone loves fences
